attributes.action: Allow 2 households to meet for Christmas day in England's Tier 4 regions
attributes.background: After such a bad year this is the one thing that would lift the mental anxiety people are suffering from.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reinstate the 5-day relaxation of COVID restrictions over Christmas: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564204

Allow families to have Christmas day together in all tiers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564312
